content: {"name": "Eastern Area Community Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We provide emergency food and financial assistance, as well as classes and programming to help build stability and independence. Emergency services are available to qualified residents in the following zip codes: 40018, 40027, 40059, 40222, 40223, 40241, 40242, 40243, 40245.\n\nREQUEST EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE: 502-426-2824 EXT. 310", "email": "", "url": "https://www.eacmonline.org/services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9104 Westport Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Louisville", "state_province": "KY", "postal_code": "40242", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.282285, "longitude": -85.583797}, "phones": [{"number": "(502) 426-2824", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}]}
